spec_data.Name: mozilla-fira-sans-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Originally designed to integrate with the character of Firefox OS, Fira is a
new set of sans-serif fonts which focuses on legibility.
This package contains the sans-serif version of Mozilla's Fira font.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 11:48:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Sans-serif version of Mozilla's Fira font
